I enjoy reading history books.

I love to dance.

content.text: Hi! I'm a librarian in training. I love history books. Do you have any favorite books?
I love reading history books too! My favorite is "A People's History of the United States" by Howard Zinn.
That's a great book! I've read it a few times. What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to dance. I took dance classes when I was younger, and I still love to dance at parties and social events.
That's awesome! I wish I could dance. I'm pretty clumsy.
You should give it a try! It's so much fun to move your body and express yourself.
I might just do that. Thanks for the suggestion!
You're welcome! Where did you grow up?
I grew up in California. I love the beach and the weather there.
I've never been to California. I grew up in New Hampshire. It's a lot colder there than California!
I can imagine! I've never been to New Hampshire, but I've heard it's beautiful.
It is! There are a lot of mountains and lakes. It's a great place to go hiking and camping.
It sounds like a lot of fun. I'd love to visit sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd love it.
